content: प्रबल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Very strong or powerful, mighty, valorous (as a man); <ls>R. 3. 60</ls>; <ls>Rs. 3. 23.</ls> {@--2@} Violent, strong, intense, excessive, very great; प्रबलतमसामेवं प्रायाः शुभेषु हि वृत्तयः <ls>Ś. 7. 24</ls>, प्रबलपुरोवातया वृष्ट्या <ls>M. 4. 2</ls>; प्रबलां वेदनां <ls>R. 8. 50.</ls> {@--3@} Important. {@--4@} Abounding with. {@--5@} Dangerous, destructive. --लः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of a Daitya. {@--2@} A sprout (पल्लव). --लं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} Exceedingly, much.
